name: Focaccia Chicken Sandwiches
author: SILVERSOLARA
summary: This is an easy but delicious chicken and broccoli sandwich that can be served with a salad.
ingredients: 1 loaf focaccia bread, cut in half horizontally
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spread brown mustard onto the chicken breasts to coat, and place them in a baking dish
Bake for about 30 minutes in the preheated oven, or until cooked through
Meanwhile, bring 1/2 inch of water to a boil in a small saucepan with a lid
Add the broccoli, and cook for 7 minutes, or until tender but still bright green
Shred or cube the chicken, and place onto the bottom half of the focaccia bread
Spread the broccoli over the chicken, and top with mozzarella cheese
Bake this part of the sandwich (without the top) for about 10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted
Place the top of the bread over the filling, and bake for another 5 minutes to heat through
Cut into small squares to serve
